item.title: How to add colored whip and the specials :)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“moh, post:3, topic:406820”]To be honnest this is a shit load of shit only taking hughe space inside your client.java, try instead of for example:

if(wearID == 8014 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8012 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8010 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8008 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8006 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8005 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8001 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7999 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7998 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7997 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7996 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7995 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

This:

if (itemId >= 7995 && itemId <= 8014 && FightType == 2) {
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

Not worth it taking so much space inside client.java, tough it is a shitty delta server this will save some space.[/quote]
I see somebody learned something from their own tutorial ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: How to add colored whip and the specials :)
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

To be honnest this is a shit load of shit only taking hughe space inside your client.java, try instead of for example:

if(wearID == 8014 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8012 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8010 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8008 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8006 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8005 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 8001 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7999 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7998 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7997 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7996 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
if(wearID == 7995 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

This:

if (itemId >= 7995 && itemId <= 8014 && FightType == 2) {
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}

Not worth it taking so much space inside client.java, tough it is a shitty delta server this will save some space.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add colored whip and the specials :)
item.dc:creator: @rip1129 rip1129
item.description:
@rip1129 wrote:

This is basically Client and server sided but the specs is server sided
Difficulty= 1/10
Client tested on = Delta , Blurr works for anything basically
What you would need = Class 8 file in your client folder, Client.java in server folder, special Java in server folder

First go to you client and open up your class 8 file and post this in there

if(i == 8014) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in a Dragon's blood.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8012) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Rune Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip smithed in Rune.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8010) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 21662; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Adamant Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip smith in Adamant.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8008) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 43297; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Mithril Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip smithed in Mithril.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8006) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 33; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Iron Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip smithed in iron.".getBytes(); } if(i == 8000) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bronze Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in bronze.".getBytes(); } if(i == 7999) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 15100; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "White Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in Snow.".getBytes(); } if(i == 7998) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10394; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Barrows Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip from the Barrows.".getBytes(); } if(i == 7997) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 34503; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Cyan Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in Cyan.".getBytes(); } if(i == 7995) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 7114; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Golden Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip covered in Gold.".getBytes(); } if(i == 7996) //WH1P!!!! { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; //this is the new option to equipt, can change to w/e u want class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; //original color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 15630; //changed color class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Nature Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Abyssal whip from Nature.".getBytes(); }
(If needed you can just change the item ids)

Now close class 8. file and open up client java

Client. java
Ok now here is the tricky part do ctrl + f and search for if(id == 4151

you should get something like thisif

(id == 4151 || id == 3888

ok now replace it with this

if(id == 4151 || id == 3888 || id == 8014 || id == 8012 || id == 8010 || id == 8008 || id == 8006 || id == 8005 || id == 8001 || id == 8000 || id == 7999 || id == 7998 || id == 7997 || id == 7996 || id == 7995) // whip {

(Basically that just makes it a whip like 4151 for example if you need to change the ids of your whips you would use those ids instead of the ones shown above)

Now Search 4151 again
Same Exact thing

if(id == 4151 ||

Now it should be some thing like this

if(id == 4151 || id == 3888 || id == 8014 || id == 8012 || id == 8010 || id == 8008 || id == 8006 || id == 8005 || id == 8001 || id == 8000 || id == 7999 || id == 7998 || id == 7997 || id == 7996 || id == 7995) // whip {

Search 4151 again and it should be the same thing shown above ^

Now search 4151 again and you should get something like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151

Replace the whole thing with this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3888 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8014 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8012 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8010 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8008 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8006 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8005 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8001 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8000 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7999 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7998 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7997 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7996 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7995) // whip {

Now Search up 4151 again and some thing like this should show up now pay attention to this part

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151

Under it you should see some thing like this
AttackingOn2.specGFX(341); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(1658); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }

Now where it is shown

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151

Basically you replace the whole line with this

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3888 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8014 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8012 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8010 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8008 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8006 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8005 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8001 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8000 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7999 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7998 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7997 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7996 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7995 )&& specialAmount > 49){

Now search 4151 again

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151

and it should show up something like this under it

specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658); stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); }

Basically replace the whole thing with this

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3888 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8014 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8012 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8010 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8008 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8006 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8005 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8001 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8000 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7999 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7998 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7997 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7996 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7995 ) && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658); stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); }

Now search up

if(wearID == 4151 && FightType == 2){

Now under it paste this

if(wearID == 8014 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8012 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8010 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8008 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8006 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8005 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 8001 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 7999 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 7998 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 7997 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 7996 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; } if(wearID == 7995 && FightType == 2){ FightType = 3; SkillID = 3; }

Now exit client.java do not compile yet

Special.java

Now search up case 4151:

Now add these cases under it

case 8014:
case 8012:
case 8010:
case 8008:
case 8006:
case 8005:
case 8001:
case 8000:
case 7999:
case 7998:
case 7997:
case 7996:
case 7995:

Now search up case 4151 again then paste the same thing under it and exit and compile

NOTE : IF YOU GET ERRORS ITS BECAUSE YOUR SERVER DOES NOT HAVE THE NEW WHIP MODEL RE SEARCH THE ID 3888 IN YOUR CLIENT AND ERASE IT FROM THE CODING THEN RECOMPILE IT SHOULD WORK I REPEAT IF YOU HAVE ERRORS DELETE THE 3888 FROM ALL OF THE CODING

Thank you and Rep++ if you want
100% by me
It should work 100% I added successfully into my server and players loved it

Read full topic
item.source: How to add colored whip and the specials :)
